title: Executive Order 5994-Withdrawal of Land Pending Legislation, Minnesota
content: It is hereby ordered that the land hereinafter described be, and the same is hereby, withdrawn subject to valid existing rights pending legislation, as provided by the act of June 25, 1910 (36 Stat. 847-848), as amended by the act of August 24, 1912 (37 Stat. 497):
This order shall continue in full force and effect unless and until revoked by the President or by act of Congress.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5994-Withdrawal of Land Pending Legislation, Minnesota Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361548
